Description: Fragment of handle to sharp turn of Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp with ribboned thyrsus(?) symbol.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 175, 3. Name Polyaratos. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0399.08.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1050)
